title: Last Works of Matisse: Large Cut Gouaches
description: This exhibit was considered a sequel to a Matisse retrospective held in 1951-1952 by the Museum of Modern Art. The contents of the show featured Matisse’s gouache works, which was a medium he did not explore until he was in his sixties. His experimentation with the large, flat shapes explored placement of forms within linear and voluminous relationships.

input: Last Works of Matisse: Large Cut Gouaches
